title: Explain why attitudes on child rearing changed

content.question: Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work.Analyze how and why western European attitudes toward children and child-rearing changed in the period from 1750 to 1900.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
